msg: OPENNLP-500: To validate the tool factory specified in the model the validateArtifactMap was trying to load the factory using reflection. Now it will try using the ExtensionLoader

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-3620: attempt to address shutdown deadlock - once the CoreContainer starts shutting down, do not start any new recoveries - there was a small window this could happen in previously
